data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Chlopsis (Teleostei: Anguilliformes: Chlopsidae) from the Southwestern Pacific.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kenneth A. Tighe, John E. McCosker (2003): Two new species of the genus Chlopsis (Teleostei: Anguilliformes: Chlopsidae) from the Southwestern Pacific. Zootaxa 236: 1-8, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:BD3747DE-FA3B-4ADD-9267-3BCBB050CEDC
